home.solar_description: is the largest renewable energy event in Mexico. RE+ MEXICO presents technology solutions, educational content and networking opportunities for the entire renewable energy industry. RE+ MEXICO showcases leading clean energy sectors, including solar, energy storage, green hydrogen, wind energy, microgrids and more.
home.why_exhibit_description1:
Take advantage of the great renewable energy potential of Mexico and North America. Join RE+ MEXICO 2024, Mexico's Energy Future Fair.

Don't miss the opportunity to acquire a stand or be a sponsor. Access potential buyers and connect with leading national and international decision makers in the solar and storage sector.

AboutSSM.title: ABOUT RE+ MEXICO
AboutSSM.description:
Mexico has set itself the goal of achieving 45% renewable energy generation by 2030. Our country has extraordinary potential in solar and wind energy, so meeting this goal will require the commitment and collaboration of the entire industry.

RE+ MEXICO is established as the strategic platform to propel our country in this accelerated transition towards a sustainable energy future, connecting the main players in the sector to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and make the most of Mexico's renewable energy capacity. In our seventh edition, from April 14 to 16, at Expo Guadalajara, Jalisco, we will bring together more than 220 leading exhibitors in the sectors of Solar Energy and Storage, Green Hydrogen, Wind Energy, Microgrids, as well as more than 50 specialists in an academic program and exclusive networking spaces to strengthen the entire renewable energy value chain.
AboutSSM.description2:
See you at RE+ MEXICO 2026!
April 14–16, Expo Guadalajara, Jalisco.

AboutReEvents.title: About RE+ Events
AboutReEvents.description:
RE+ Events is the evolution of SPI, ESI, and Smart Energy Week. Originally developed by the nation’s leading solar energy organizations to engage the business community, the Smart Electric Power Alliance (SEPA), and the Solar Energy Industries Association (SEIA), RE+ reflects an ongoing entrepreneurial approach to renew best practices across the clean energy landscape as the marketplace evolves.

Registration to RE+ gives you access to solar, energy storage, hydrogen, EV infrastructure, grid edge technology, and wind power education sessions and exhibiting companies, along with multiple days packed with networking events.

AboutSNEC.title: About SNEC PV POWER EXPO
AboutSNEC.description: SNEC 18th (2025) International Photovoltaic Power Generation and Smart Energy Conference & Exhibition [SNEC PV POWER EXPO] will be held in Shanghai, China, on June 11-13, 2025. It was initiated and co-organized by Asian Photovoltaic Industry Association (APVIA), Chinese Renewable Energy Society (CRES), Chinese Renewable Energy Industries Association (CREIA), Shanghai Federation of Economic Organizations (SFEO), Shanghai Science & Technology Exchange Center (SSTEC), Shanghai New Energy Industry Association (SNEIA) and 25 international associations and organizations.</br></br>The exhibition scale of SNEC has evolved from 15,000sqm in 2007 to over 380,000 sqm in 2024 when it attracted over 3,600 exhibiting companies from 95 countries and regions all over the world and the overseas exhibitor ratio is over 30%. SNEC has become the biggest international PV tradeshow with incomparable influence in China, in Asia and even in the world.</br></br>As the most professional PV exhibition, SNEC showcases PV manufacturing facilities, materials, PV cells, PV application products & modules, PV project and system, energy storage and mobile energy, covering every section of the whole PV industry chain.</br></br>The SNEC Conference consist of various programs incorporating different topics, covering the market trends of PV industry, collaboration and development strategies, policy directions of different countries, advanced industry technologies, PV finance and investment, etc. It is an opportunity that you cannot miss to stay up to date on the technology and market, present your results to the community, and network with industrial experts, scholars and entrepreneurs and colleagues.</br></br>We are looking forward to the worldwide PV industry friends gathering at Shanghai, China. From the industry’s viewpoint, let us take pulse of the PV power market of China, Asia, and the world, so as to guide the innovative development of the PV industry! Hope all of us meet at Shanghai, on June 11-13, 2025!

whyexhibit.description_main: Exhibiting at RE+ Mexico allows you to position your brand in a rapidly growing market, access new buyers through international networks, and reach 10,000 key decision makers in sectors such as solar energy, storage, green hydrogen and wind. In addition, you will be able to strengthen business relationships, promote your products to a select audience, generate leads at a unique event in Mexico, and train your customers on new technologies.

whyexhibit.description: Showcase your brand at the forefront of a rapidly growing marketplace
whyexhibit.description2: Gain access to new buyers through the worldwide network of Deutsche Messe SNEC and Solar Power International.
whyexhibit.description3: Reach decision makers from all segments of the solar and storage industry.
whyexhibit.description4: Build and nurture your business relationships with current and prospective customers
whyexhibit.description5: Meet with your current customers and seek new business alliances
whyexhibit.description6: Promote your brands and products to a professional, focused and selective audience.
whyexhibit.description7: Generate new leads at Mexico's first event of its kind
whyexhibit.description8: Train your customers in the application of new products and technologies.

ExhibitorProfile.description: RE+ MEXICO provides the entire solar industry with a platform. If your company is engaged in the fields of solar energy, solar thermal, energy storage, power generation, network supply, grid management and/or smart grids, then don’t miss out on exhibiting at RE+ MEXICO. Your product and services can range from solar cells and modules, parts and components, new technology and tracking systems, traditional plants to planners & developers and systems & service providers.

WhyVisit.title: Why Visit?
WhyVisit.description:
RE+ MEXICO brings together global solar energy expertise in one place for three days of research, discovery and real business. At this event you will have the opportunity to meet face to face with experts in solar energy, energy storage, green hydrogen and wind power such as:

  • Manufacturers
  • Suppliers
  • Distributors
  • Etc.


RE+ MEXICO will feature an exhibition area as well as a comprehensive, first-class educational program. Do you want to learn about new trends, find the latest local and international products and/or get in touch with relevant companies on how they could help you with your next project? Then don't miss this unique opportunity and visit RE+ MEXICO.

hotels.text_description:
Expo Guadalajara is the largest convention center in Mexico and Latin America, with more than 1,230,000 square feet of modern space for international trade shows, conferences, and exhibitions.

Located in the heart of Guadalajara, it offers first-class connectivity and is surrounded by hotels, restaurants, and services that make it the ideal venue for world-class events.
hotels.title: Special Hotel Rates
hotels.description:
Expo Guadalajara is the largest convention center in Mexico and Latin America, with more than 119,000 m² of modern spaces for international fairs, congresses and exhibitions.

Located in the heart of Guadalajara, it offers first-class connectivity and is surrounded by hotels, restaurants and services that make it the ideal venue for world-class events.
hotels.place: The hotel is located right in front.
hotels.description_gdl:
Guadalajara, the pearl of western Mexico, stands out as a city full of charm and diversity. Known as the 'Pearl of Tapatia', Guadalajara combines Mexico's rich historical heritage with vibrant modernity.

The city is famous for its colonial architecture, picturesque squares and an atmosphere that reflects the warmth of its people. Walking through the historic center, you will immerse yourself in cobblestone streets that lead to impressive churches, such as the Guadalajara Cathedral and the Zapopan Basilica. Mexican culture is found in every corner, from the traditional markets to the colorful murals that adorn the streets.
hotels.restaurants_desc:
Guadalajara is known for its traditional Mexican cuisine, which can be enjoyed in the city's many restaurants. Typical dishes include cakes drowned, pozole, birria and meat in its juice. The city also offers a wide variety of international restaurants, ranging from Italian to Japanese food. Apr
For those seeking gourmet experiences, the city has elegant restaurants offering sophisticated menus and a careful selection of wines. Whether you find yourself exploring the historic neighborhoods or the more modern areas of the city, the restaurants in Guadalajara invite you to a feast of authentic and exciting flavors. In many places, you can also enjoy live music, creating a unique dining experience that captures the vibrant essence of the city.
hotels.entertainment_desc:
Guadalajara is a city that offers a wide variety of entertainment activities. From museums to art galleries, the city has a host of places that celebrate Mexican culture.

The city also has a large number of parks and green areas, offering an escape from urban life.
hotels.money_desc: If you are planning a visit to Guadalajara, it is important to know that the official currency of Mexico is the Mexican peso (MXN). The Mexican peso is used in everyday transactions, and you will find bills and coins in various denominations.
hotels.link_currency: Click here to use the currency converter.

sunset_cocktail.description: An exclusive evening with music, drinks, and networking. It will feature exhibitors, VIP guests, and leaders from the energy sector.

vip_networking.subtitle: Premium Experience
vip_networking.date: The three days of the event
vip_networking.description:
It is an exclusive networking space designed for professional visitors who wish to combine comfort, productivity, and high-level strategic connections.

The VIP AREA offers coffee breaks and is also the venue for the Sunset Cocktail, an event where exhibitors, sponsors, and VIP buyers gather in a relaxed atmosphere to forge strategic relationships and generate real business opportunities.
